Package org.jfree.chart.block

Class ColorBlock

java.lang.Object
org.jfree.chart.block.AbstractContentBlock
org.jfree.chart.block.ColorBlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Block, ContentBlock, org.jfree.ui.Drawable
public class ColorBlock extends AbstractContentBlock implements Block
A block that is filled with a single color.
